      • handleInteraction

        public boolean handleInteraction(int entityId)
        Handles a player clicking on a virtual attachment part. Returns true if this minecart was indeed interacted with. Tracks the interaction that was performed so that it can later be deduced which attachment was interacted.
        Parameters:
        entityId -
        Returns:
        True if interaction was handled
